name: Space Warrior (excshi)
description:
High-score based 2-D Space Shooter

Developed in 2 weeks

Aliens Are Worth 1 Point

Spaceships Are Worth 10 Points

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys To Move (Left and Right turns the ship and Up activates the thrusters)

Space To Shoot

Esc To Quit (Reloads Game on Webpage)
